references.reference: i had the opportunity to work with Phil for a period of two years in netweaver lifecycle management team at sap labs,. Phil is a highly motivated individual with never ending enthusiasm for his work as well as all of his extra curricular activities. i was quite impressed by his technical acumen while working on various assignments in the area of netweaver lifecycle management. he took initiative in coming up with innovative solutions in his assignments on numerous occasions especially when faced with complex scenarios. Phil also was highly active on sap developer network during this period. he was a consistent contributor to the network with contributions in the form of blogs as well as various articles., Phil is an incredible leader. his passion for software development and goes above beyond his job, he has a very valuable and teamwork has outstanding skills. he also an internal drive to succeed yet appears easygoing on the outside. lloyd can jump into the technical weeds where appropriate and then come back and focus on driving measurable business outcomes with. i certainly expect that lloyd successes will continue on any team. highly recommended., i worked with alejandro while at pley and it was an absolute pleasure. alejandro designed and developed the backend of pley. from the perspective of a qa engineer, he was a dream to work with as he always cared for quality of the product and ensured any fixes in a timely manner. he comes up with all the edge cases ability, and to push the development further than. carl was not only a strong team player and tech that he helped his colleagues with a good design
